kpi_info.title: M5213C3
kpi_info.use: Based on pseudowire sequence numbers an estimation of the amount of lost packets shall be provided guided by RFC 4717. Rules for this packet loss counter: If (received seq no > expected seq no) Counter = Counter + (received - expected). If (received seq nomber less or equal expected seq number) Counter remains unchanged. Updated : The counter is updated every second following below rules: If received seq no > expected seq no) Counter = Counter + (received - expected). If (received seq nomber less or equal expected seq number) Counter remains unchanged.
